channel.title: ★ Ether-RSPS ★ 317 Oldschool ★ Bossing ★ Player Killing ★ Iron Man Mode ★ Pets ★
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UREyiv1.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]*We are currently in Beta, and apologise for any lag or bugs that have accompanied this.*[/b][/size]
We’re an up and coming 317 private server which combines both the nostalgia of old school, without all the work needed!
You may ask what separates us from the thousands of other old school servers?
[b]Our Features[/b]:
Extremely stable - no lag Hosted on a DDoS protected server - online 24/7 Global stair and door handlers. Ever seen a RSPS where you can use every single door and stair in our available areas? Perfected clipping systems. We offer realistic safe spots and no monster will every walk through a tree! An upcoming and friendly player community Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations A fully working Iron Man mode Regular, Hard, or Nightmare modes A prestige system, which includes a prestige shop Stable economy Challenging experience rate - not too fast or too slow Challenge many bosses and obtain rewards Several minigames, including duel arena, barrows, fight pits, fight caves and pest control! All 317 skills, fully working Mage Following Range Following Clipped Projectiles Clipped Following Clipped Npcs Dragon Claws Imbued Rings Amazing Switching Correct Drops PK Point System PK Point Shops Old School Styled Pking Pest Control Barrows Great Dagganoth Caves Slayer Skill with Slayer Gem Working Ice Queen Lair Chaos Elemental Over 15 different bosses Boss pets Tzhaar Cave Correct Demon Models All Doors Working and even more!...
I apologise in advance for any oversized pictures:
[spoiler=Our Pictures][img]http://i.imgur.com/0gI0RLW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yaFuHx0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4ViMKPr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/anInxxr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GdgnOad.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XZruJRO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LvhHqYg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bd0RRMU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mz0S6uh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Tx54V2v.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SZ7o4Kc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5nRwyXt.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[size=12pt][b]Forum Link[/b]: http://ether-rsps.com/ [b]Client Download[/b] is found on the forums.[/size] [/center]

For example, we have a 100% working Kraken and a Kalphite Queen now, but there is much more to check out!

item.title: ★ Ether-RSPS ★ 317 Oldschool ★ Bossing ★ Player Killing ★ Iron Man Mode ★ Pets ★
item.dc:creator: @Ether-RSPS Ether-RSPS
item.description:
@Ether-RSPS wrote:

[center]

UREyiv1.png768×507

[size=12pt]We are currently in Beta, and apologise for any lag or bugs that have accompanied this.[/size]

We’re an up and coming 317 private server which combines both the nostalgia of old school, without all the work needed!

You may ask what separates us from the thousands of other old school servers?

Our Features:

Extremely stable - no lag
Hosted on a DDoS protected server - online 24/7
Global stair and door handlers. Ever seen a RSPS where you can use every single door and stair in our available areas?
Perfected clipping systems. We offer realistic safe spots and no monster will every walk through a tree!
An upcoming and friendly player community
Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations
A fully working Iron Man mode
Regular, Hard, or Nightmare modes
A prestige system, which includes a prestige shop
Stable economy
Challenging experience rate - not too fast or too slow
Challenge many bosses and obtain rewards
Several minigames, including duel arena, barrows, fight pits, fight caves and pest control!
All 317 skills, fully working
Mage Following
Range Following
Clipped Projectiles
Clipped Following
Clipped Npcs
Dragon Claws
Imbued Rings
Amazing Switching
Correct Drops
PK Point System
PK Point Shops
Old School Styled Pking
Pest Control
Barrows
Great Dagganoth Caves
Slayer Skill with Slayer Gem Working
Ice Queen Lair
Chaos Elemental
Over 15 different bosses
Boss pets
Tzhaar Cave
Correct Demon Models
All Doors Working
and even more!..

I apologise in advance for any oversized pictures:
